reviews.title: loved the staff
reviews.text: we stayed in the hotel for one week, and we enjoyed every minute of our stay the staff were very friendly and spoke fluent english the food was good the room was well equippled with all the amenities and a refrigertor at no addotional cost carmen and shermaine were exceptional in their professionalism there was no noise the rooms were cleaned daily and promptly the staff were helpful and gave good directions we had a wonderful stay

We did not intend to stay here, but decided it would be the easiest thing to do after failing to navigate the requirements to secure a camping spot at nearby Rio Abajo. There was plenty of space, the room was clean and pretty quiet considering the busy highway outside, and we enjoyed the pool area. The staff was friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Nice place for an overnight

reviews.text: Even if you are just on your way to the caves at Rio Camuy, don't miss the beach at Playa Sardinera (10 minutes walk west along the beach)--the naturally protected swimming area was delightful.
reviews.title: Exceeded our expectations

reviews.text: This hotel was the perfect place to say for us on the north coast becasue we wanted to visit the telescope one afternoon and the caves the next morning. Its about 30 minutes from the hotel for both. The rooms were clean large and the staff was very accomodating.

reviews.text: The restaurant ( cafe) across the street is great for breakfast or a light dinner or lunch. If you want a larger meal use the formal dining room at the restaurant attached.
